entry.title: PranjalKaushik77/shareHub: ShareFile is a peer-to-peer file-sharing app for quick transfers of small PDF and text files without authentication. Built with HTML, CSS, JS, and Firebase Storage, it allows users to upload files and share links instantly. The project is lightweight, simple, and deployed via Firebase Hosting with GitHub Actions for automation. 🚀
entry.content: ShareFile is a peer-to-peer file-sharing app for quick transfers of small PDF and text files without authentication. Built with HTML, CSS, JS, and Firebase Storage, it allows users to upload files and share links instantly. The project is lightweight, simple, and deployed via Firebase Hosting with GitHub Actions for automation. 🚀
